content:
Dear Hiring Team,

I am excited to apply for the Summer Student role in Human Resources at METROLINX. As a third-year Electrical Engineering student with a passion for innovation and a strong desire to learn more about computer hardware and electronic designs, I am confident that my skills and experiences align well with the requirements of the role.

I understand that the position involves working closely with others and coordinating a portfolio of projects from end-to-end. My 4 years of experience as a Retail Associate at McDonalds, 10+ months of experience as an Administrative Assistant and Support, and my previous extracurricular experiences have helped me develop strong coordination and teamworking skills in fast-paced work environments. My friendly demeanor, coupled with my multitasking abilities, have also helped me communicate effectively with customers and colleagues.

In addition, I am well-versed in project coordination and have experience in supporting Project Managers throughout all phases of the project management lifecycle. I am skilled in developing, managing, and controlling schedules, and am able to make continuous updates and mitigation decisions, escalating issues when necessary. My analytical and problem-solving skills, along with my experience in tracking and reporting, allow me to effectively track progress, make recommendations on response plans for risks, and report results on action items. I am also proficient in tracking and reconciling project financials, ensuring resolution of anomalies, and updating and reconciling ongoing estimates.

I am an organized and communicative individual with strong time management skills. I am able to prioritize competing priorities to ensure successful outcomes, and have excellent verbal and written communication skills to effectively articulate ideas and opinions that involve research, interpretation, and assessment. I enjoy being presented with problems or issues and working with a team to find innovative solutions, and am curious and enjoy working in a team to visualize and design a possible new product or service and to assess the market, business and technical merits of that concept.

Furthermore, I have experience in data analytics, and have the technical skills to review and evaluate data to find innovative opportunities and share with partners. I am proficient in the MS Office and other tools required to study and present my findings. I also enjoy the process of evaluating current processes and identifying improvements that will optimize or improve standards.

Lastly, I am a values-driven individual who brings my authentic self to work and lives by the values of trust, teamwork, and accountability. I am excited about the opportunity to meet with you personally and arrange a time to further discuss my qualifications. Thank you for your time and consideration. You may contact me at 647-717-5780 or my personal email, [aman.ayaz44@gmail.com](mailto:aman.ayaz44@gmail.com).
